mapper.select: SELECT /* com.onedu.mvc.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectEncryptedPwd() */ USER_PWD FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ACT = '활동회원' AND USER_ID = #{ userId }

SELECT /* com.onedu.mvc.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectLoginMember() */ USER_ID , USER_NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , POSTAL , ADDRESS , ADDRESS2 , ENROLL_DATE , USER_ROLE , USER_ACT FROM MEMBER A WHERE USER_ACT = '활동회원' AND USER_ID = #{ userId }
SELECT /* com.onedu.mvc.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#memberIdCheck() */ COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{ userId }

SELECT /* com.onedu.mvc.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectChangedMemberInfo() */ USER_ID , USER_NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , ENROLL_DATE , USER_ROLE , USER_ACT FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ACT = 'Y' AND GRADE = #{ no }
mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.onedu.mvc.member.model.dao.MemberDAO##deleteMember() */ MEMBER SET USER_ACT = 'N' WHERE USER_ACT = 'Y' AND GRADE = #{ no }
